name: ReinT1
_source: speak;Caellach;Hey, Carlyle!|Impressive work you've done here.|My compliments.
speak;Carlyle;...I gave you everything I promised.|I opened the hall to your forces.
speak;Caellach;Yes.|The palace is mine.|My palace...|Oh, how I do like the sound of that.
speak;Carlyle;Do whatever you want with the royal treasury.|The only treasure I wish to leave here with is the queen of my heart.
speak;Caellach;Oh, yeah, about your queen?..|There's been a change of plans.
speak;Caellach;Don't move, Carlyle.|You twitch, and the queen dies.
speak;Carlyle;Blackheart!|What is the meaning of this?

speak;Caellach;Calm down.|You'll get her back as soon as I'm done with her.|Jehanna's Sacred Stone is around here somewhere.|I've got to find it and destroy it.|I need this woman to guide me to its hiding place.
speak;Carlyle;Do not lay a hand on my queen!
speak;Caellach;Don't get so incensed.|I'm not going to harm her.|I'm not like that freak Valter.|I'm kind to women.|But if you make a wrong move, you'll lose your prize.|Understood?
speak;Caellach;There are some annoying pests outside who think to win back the hall.|I want you to take care of them.|Lose, and the queen will never be yours.
speak;Carlyle;If my queen comes to any harm in your care...
speak;Caellach;Yes, of course.|I know all about the might of your sword arm.|As long as the Sacred Stone is destroyed, you'll get all you ask for.
speak;Lyon;Caellach...|You will put an end to this.|Destroying the Sacred Stones is...|Ugh...ack...
speak;Caellach;What's this?|Are you still ill?|You know, you're not very princely.|C'mon. Follow me.
